Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Darmanian Way, between the Temple of Clerical Science on the south side of the road and Issac's Bard Cant on the north side of the road.
Room.LongDescription: Issac's Bard Cant is a small place were bards can come to exchange various songs and incantations between others of their kind. Unfortunately, there is not a lot of bard activity in Oceancrest, and most of them stick around this area of town in order to get some inspiration from the various travelers who wander in and out around this area.
